襣襣襣

襣字的基本解释

襣
bì
短裤衩。

襣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》毗至切，去至，並。］
无裆短裤。今俗称满裆裤。《玉篇·衣部》：“襣，毗二切。犢鼻褌，三尺布作，形如牛鼻，相如所著也。”一说形制似围裙。参阅清钱大昕《十驾斋养新录·犊鼻褌》。

襣字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襣； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1126第18
【唐韻】【集韻】?毗至切，音鼻。【類篇】㡓也。【揚子·方言】無?之袴謂之襣。【郭註】袴無踦者，卽今犢鼻褌。【玉篇】犢鼻以全三尺布作，形如牛鼻，相如所著也。

襣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
襣字的起名意思

暂无。

Lintel
Basic explanation of words
Lintel
bì
Short pants.
Lintel
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" Adjacent to cutting, going to, and. ]
Crotchless shorts. Today it is commonly known as full crotch pants. "Yu Pian·Clothing Department": "The lintel, adjoining two cuts. The tummy nose is made of three-foot cloth, shaped like a bull's nose, and looks like what is written." It is said that the shape is like an apron. Please refer to Qing Qian Daxin's "New Record of Raising Shijiazhai·Dubbitin".
Lintel
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　襣; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1126 Page 18
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Adjacent to cutting, sound nose. [Class articles] 㡓 also. [Yangtze Dialect] No? The hakama is called the lintel. [Guo's Note] Those who have no hakama will have a small nose. [Jade articles] The nose is made of three-foot cloth, shaped like a cow's nose, and looks like the one written.
